help-file.title: "ILLUSIONARY WALL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: direction Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Illusion
This spell creates an illusion that effectively hides normal exits from the naked eye. Anyone attempting to try and exit in the direction that this wall exists has a chance to disbelieve the illusion and pass. One can also try to search the area around where the exit once was and may find the wall thus negating the effects.
